sources.title: Customers Wanted (1939)
sources.description: Popeye and Bluto are running competing penny arcades, trying to bring in customer Wimpy. Of course, he would gladly pay Tuesday for a penny today. And of course, their competing arcades show clips featuring each of them, with well over half of this short thus recycled. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/customers-wanted-1939/

metadata.Plot: Popeye and Bluto are running competing penny arcades, trying to bring in customer Wimpy. Of course, he would gladly pay Tuesday for a penny today. And of course, their competing arcades show clips featuring each of them, with well over half this short thus recycled.
metadata.Director: Dave Fleischer, Willard Bowsky, Seymour Kneitel
metadata.Actors: Pinto Colvig, Margie Hines, Jack Mercer
